name: Thor
description: The powerful god of thunder and lightning.
superpowers: Ripped abs, ability to smash empty beer glasses

name: Iron Man
superpowers: Witty, cooler than you, also nerdier than you.

name: Hulk
description: The mighty Hulk, the strongest and most powerful creature in the Universe.
superpowers: Superhuman strength and durability...which he didn't use in Endgame at all.

name: Black Widow
description: The world's most skilled spy and assassin.
superpowers: Can punch and kick bad guys.

name: Hawkeye
superpowers: Can punch and kick bad guys. Also, he can use a bow and arrow like a boy scout.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: The witch with the power of magic and the essence of reality.
superpowers: Most emo of the crew. Super powerful. Super moody.

name: Black Panther
description: The king of Wakanda, the black panther.
superpowers: Crazy agile. Got his butt kicked once by by Killmonger.

name: Captain America
description: The first Avenger and the leader of the Avengers.

name: Doctor Strange
description: The master of the mystic arts and the sorceress of reality.

name: Wolverine
description: Hot-tempered, self-healing, I-do-it-on-my-own kind of mutant.
